title: Account Icon Photos in Thunderbird Android
creator: Lizzardicus.Spork
content: Can we PLEASE have the ability to use/customize account icon photos on Thunderbird Android, instead of just the letters/text of the account name??? Being able to use/have photos there helps more with which account we're looking at!
